alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas; Iron (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Bayfield, eastern Douglas, west central Iron and southwestern Ashland Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mellen, to 8 miles south of Barnes, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mellen around 135 PM CDT. Cable around 145 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include High Bridge, Totagatic Lake, Middle Eau Claire Lake, Upper Eau Claire Lake, Copper Falls State Park, Lake Owen, Grand View and Bad River Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. These storms may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
